data.short_description: World Of Stalkers is an exciting online first-person shooter, Stalker-style, in which you have to fight the strongest Stalkers of Cordona. An unforgettable multiplayer experience awaits you in the Exclusion Zone, where not only skill and accuracy, but also the ability to play as a team, decides.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Требуются 64-разрядные процессор и операционная система
  • Processor: Core i3,i4,i5,
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon hd 7850 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Требуются 64-разрядные процессор и операционная система
  • Processor: AMD - fx-8350 4ghz 8-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
